column1: The Pit Room////I apologize if the staff was not as accommodating as we aim for. Our menu works in various ways; you can order by weight or you can order a 1/2/3 meat combo which comes with sides. When dining in or visiting for the first time
column2: we always recommend the latter as if gives you more variety! We are glad to hear you enjoyed your meal and yes - portions are hefty! We hope you took some home with you :)
